content: justify-items-stretch xs:grid-cols-1 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-900 grid grid-cols-4 gap-8 py-6 lg:py-8 md:grid-cols-4

item.title: mb-2 uppercase text-sm text-stone-900 font-bold dark:text-stone-100
item.class: poppins-font font-normal link link-hover flex flex-row items-center py-1
item.color: dark:text-gray-200 text-xs text-stone-800 hover:text-red-700 transition duration-700 ease-in-out
